name: facilities_lookup
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tanzania_api.
Tool description: The Tanzania API provides endpoints to lookup locations, find facilities and perform geospatial operations such as distance calculation and directions between two locations in Tanzania.
API description: This endpoint allows you to get facilities in Tanzania like hospital, bank, college, etc. by providing optional query parameters for facility type, region and city. It returns a list of facilities that match the query parameters.

type.description:
The type of amenity facility to search for (default: **hospital**)
Options:
**aerodrome, bar, cafe, fast_food, pub, restaurant, college, driving_school, school, university, bank, atm, pharmacy,** etc..        

[More options->](https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Map_features#Amenity)

region.description: The region where the facility is located.

limit.description: The maximum number of facilities to return. Default is 10.

city.description: The city where the facility is located. Default is 'douala'.
